DetailsSummaryForm.title: Confirm your application
DetailsSummaryForm.disclaimerText: By continuing you are confirming that, to the best of your knowledge, the details you are providing are correct and you are consenting to us submitting these details to ID verification agencies to check your identity.
DetailsSummaryForm.detailsSummary: How will DVA use my data?
DetailsSummaryForm.detailsText: A long detailed description of what DVA will use the data and something about GDPR probably. We all appreciate some good copy.

ServicesToInformForm.title: List of services we can inform

ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.title: Introduction
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.paragraph1: Jobseeker's Allowance is a means-tested payment made to people who are unemployed and
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.firstPoint: who do not qualify for Jobseeker's Benefit or Jobseeker's Benefit for the Self-Employed
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.secondPoint: whose entitlement to Jobseeker's Benefit or Jobseeker's Benefit for the Self-Employed has expired
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.thirdPoint: who do qualify for Jobseeker's Benefit or Jobseeker's Benefit for the Self-Employed but choose to claim optional Jobseeker's Allowance instead.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.paragraph2: Whether you qualify for Jobseeker's Allowance depends on your income and whether you are habitually resident in Ireland. In other words, you live here and have close links to Ireland.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.paragraph3: Jobseeker's Benefit is a weekly payment from the Department of Social Protection (DSP) to people who are out of work and are covered by social insurance (PRSI). If you don't qualify for Jobseeker's Benefit you may qualify for Jobseeker's Allowance.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.paragraph4: Jobseeker's Benefit (Self-Employed) gives income support to self-employed people who are no longer engaged in self-employment.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceIntro.paragraph5: If you are 65 and have left employment or self-employment, you may qualify for the Benefit Payment for 65 Year Olds until you turn 66.

ApplyJobseekersAllowanceBenefitsEntitlem.title: Your benefits entitlements
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceBenefitsEntitlem.paragraph1: Your Jobseekers Benefit entitlement has expired.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceBenefitsEntitlem.paragraph2: You may still apply for Jobseekers allowance

ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRequirements.title: Apply for Jobseeker's Allowance
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRequirements.firstSubtitle: To qualify for Jobseeker's Allowance, you must:

requirements.0: Be over 18 and under 66 years of age
requirements.6: Be fully or partly unemployed (at least 4 days out of work in every 7)

ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRequirements.note: Note: If you are self-employed, the last condition does not apply.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRequirements.firstParagraph: You can work for up to 3 days a week and may still get Jobseeker's Allowance for the other days. If you are getting Jobseeker's Allowance, you can use a benefit of work estimator to see how taking up part-time work would affect the amount you would get.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRequirements.secondParagraph: The Reckoner works out the total amount you would get if you take up part-time work (including any Working Family Payment payable for the family) and compares this to what you are getting in jobseeker's payments (including Rent Supplement).

ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRates.title: What may I receive?
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRates.firstParagraph: Your rate of payment will depend on your income and the outcome of the means assessment. If you have no means, are aged 25 or over, and you are single, you will get the full weekly payment of €232.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRates.secondParagraph: An increase is payable for each child dependant if you are getting an increase for a qualified adult. If you do not qualify for an increase for a qualified adult, you may get a half-rate increase for a qualified child dependant.
ApplyJobseekersAllowanceRates.subtitle: The current rates are as follows:

extraPaymentChildUnder12Full.key: Extra payment for <bold>qualified child 12 and over</bold>

ApplyJobseekersAllowanceQuestions.title: What will you be asked about?

details.title: Your details
details.description: Questions about you, your address, any children and your relationship status.

employmentInfo.title: Employment and training information
employmentInfo.description: Questions about your employment history and training or education.

financialInfo.title: Your financial information
financialInfo.description: Questions about any income, savings or investments you or your partner may have.

BeforeYouStartForm.title: Before you start
BeforeYouStartForm.paragraph1: During the pilot phase, you can only install the Government Digital Wallet on one phone.
BeforeYouStartForm.paragraph2: Please note that this form is for pilot users and will not be part of the future roll-out.
BeforeYouStartForm.paragraph3: Please ensure that you have the following ready:
BeforeYouStartForm.listItem2: The phone that you will use to download the Government Digital Wallet
BeforeYouStartForm.subTitle: Please have the following information ready to proceed:
BeforeYouStartForm.appStoreEmailAddress: Your Apple or Android app store email address

GovernmentDetails.title: About your work
GovernmentDetails.subTitle: This pilot is for public servants only.
GovernmentDetails.paragraph: We require your work email address to verify you before adding you to the pilot.

DeviceSelection.title: Your device
DeviceSelection.subTitle: For the pilot, we need to know the email address linked to your phone. We need this information to ensure that you are added to the correct testing platform.
DeviceSelection.selectDeviceText: Please tell us which kind of device you are using.
DeviceSelection.android: Android (eg. Samsung, Google, Huawei, Xiaomi, LG), minimum version 6.0

ios.text: This is the email address connected to the phone that will host the pilot app.
ios.subtext: To find the email address linked to your device:
ios.point-2: Select the top option (this usually has your username).
ios.point-3: Your email address is at the top of this page.

android.text: This is the email address connected to the phone that will host the pilot app.
android.subtext: To find the email address linked to your device:
android.point-2: Click on the button at the top-right corner next to the search bar and notifications icon (it is a round button with your profile picture or the initials of your name).
android.point-3: This opens a pop-up window with information about your Google account.
android.point-4: In the top section, you can find your name and, below it, your registered email address.

DetailsSummary.title: Check your details
DetailsSummary.mygovidDataHeading: These details are automatically populated by your MyGovID account. If this is not you or you have any queries relating to these details please contact support@mygovid.ie
DetailsSummary.filledDataHeading: Please make any necessary changes via the change link provided before submitting your application
DetailsSummary.android: Android (eg. Samsung, Google, Huawei, Xiaomi, LG)

VerifyAccountLevel0.title: Verify your MyGovId account
VerifyAccountLevel0.whyVerifyFirstParagraph: You have a basic MyGovID account. To ensure that your Government Digital Wallet is secure, you need to have a verified MyGovID account.
VerifyAccountLevel0.whyVerifySecondParagraph: Please visit <link>MyGovID</link> and it will guide you through the process.
VerifyAccountLevel0.whyVerifyThirdParagraph: Once verified, come back to the <link>Life Events portal</link> to apply for the pilot

VerifyAccountLevel1.title: Verify your MyGovId account
VerifyAccountLevel1.whyVerifyFirstParagraph: You have gone through the SAFE registration process with MyGovID, but to ensure that your wallet is secure, there’s one more step.
VerifyAccountLevel1.whyVerifySecondParagraph: The <link>MyGovID portal</link> will show you how to get a verified account that lets you avail of online services.
VerifyAccountLevel1.whyVerifyThirdParagraph: Once verified, come back to the <link>Life Events portal</link> to apply for the Digital Wallet pilot.

ApplicationSuccessful.title: Thank you!
ApplicationSuccessful.paragraph-1: We are processing your information and making sure you can be part of this exciting pilot.
ApplicationSuccessful.paragraph-2: You will receive an email to the work email address you have provided. You will need to click on the link included in the email, as this verifies that you are a public servant.
ApplicationSuccessful.paragraph-3: Once confirmed, we will use the email address provided for your device to on-board you to the correct testing platform. You will then receive an email to your MyGovID email address with instructions on how to download the Government Digital Wallet app.
ApplicationSuccessful.getDigitalWalletBody: Thank you for submitting your application, your request will be reviewed soon.

needToBeVerified.subject: You’re getting closer: Verify your MyGovID
needToBeVerified.title: Hi

paragraphs.p1: Thank you for your interest in being part of the Government Digital Wallet pilot.
paragraphs.p2: For security reasons, we need you to be a fully verified MyGovID user. This will ensure you can use the Life Events portal to its full potential and enjoy all the benefits of the Government Digital Wallet.
paragraphs.p3: Please click <link>here</link> for full MyGovID verification instructions.
paragraphs.p4: Once you are fully verified, please log into the Life Events portal to get a start on downloading the Government Digital Wallet.

verifyGovEmailAddress.subject: Please verify that you are a public servant
verifyGovEmailAddress.title: Hi

paragraphs.p1: Thanks for signing up to be part of the Government Digital Wallet pilot.
paragraphs.p2: Since this is a pilot that is only open to public servants, please click <link>here</link> to verify your government email address and express your interest in applying for the wallet.

paragraphs.p1: Thank you for verifying your government email address. You have now been added to the list of pilot users. Look out for an email with instructions on how to download the Government Digital Wallet. Enjoy!

AppOnboardingEmail.subject: You’re ready to get your Government Digital Wallet
AppOnboardingEmail.title: Congratulations

paragraphs.p1: You have been approved as a civil servant and can join the Government Digital Wallet pilot scheme.

ios.p1: This is a pilot programme which runs on a testing platform called Testflight. This is Apple’s way of giving people early access to an app.
ios.p2: Please download the TestFlight app to get started.
ios.p3: You will then download the Government Digital Wallet App to Testflight.
ios.p4: Your Government Digital Wallet journey starts now.

android.p1: Click the link below to download the Government Digital Wallet from the Play Store.
android.p2: <important>Note:</important> As this is a pilot programme the app is not publicly available right now.
android.p4: Once downloaded, open the app and follow the instructions
android.p5: Your Government Digital Wallet journey starts now.

UserConsentFlow.title: Welcome to Life Events
UserConsentFlow.p1: The Government Digital Wallet pilot is open to public servants only.
UserConsentFlow.p3: T open to public servants only.
UserConsentFlow.p2: Before you can download the Government Digital Wallet, we need your work email address to verify that you are a public servant and we will need your device app store email to ensure you are added to the correct testing platform. By participating in the pilot, you consent to the collection and storage of this data. This data will be used solely for the purpose of managing and improving the pilot. All of your data is handled in compliance with GDPR and data protection law. For additional information on how we handle your data, please refer to our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.
UserConsentFlow.checkbox: I confirm that I am a public servant and I consent to be a participant in the Government Digital Wallet pilot. I understand that I can withdraw from the pilot at any time

FeedbackBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <mail>feedback</mail> will help us to improve it.
